Account¶

account.views.home(request)[source]¶

This function renders the home page of our website. Which is create an account by default

Parameters

  • name – request - used to generate responses(Http) depending on the request that it receives

  • type – HttpResponse

Returns

returns signup page

account.views.homepage(request)[source]¶

This function renders the home page of our website. Which is create an account by default

Parameters

  • name – request - used to generate responses(Http) depending on the request that it receives

  • type – HttpResponse

Returns

returns posts page

account.views.signup(request)[source]¶

This function is for user signup. User will get values from form and it will check if username or email is already registerted or not. Then it will create a user object and save it.

Parameters

  • name – request - used to generate responses(Http) depending on the request that it receives

  • type – HttpResponse

Returns

returns create account page

account.views.user_login(request)[source]¶

This function is for user login and google recapthcha. It will check if the user is registerted or not. This function will also make sure if you are not a robot. After that it will try to log in with credentials.

Parameters

  • name – request - used to generate responses(Http) depending on the request that it receives

  • type – HttpResponse

Returns

returns login page

account.views.user_logout(request)[source]¶

This function is for user logout.

Parameters

  • name – request - used to generate responses(Http) depending on the request that it receives

  • type – HttpResponse

Returns

returns login page
